programme.title: URI - The Surgical Strike
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, URI – The Surgical Strike chronicles the Indian Army’s 2016 surgical strike on terror launchpads across the Line of Control in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir. Led by Major Vihaan Singh Shergill, the mission is carried out as retaliation for the deadly Uri base camp attack. With intense training, strategic execution, and nationalistic fervor, the film is a gripping military action drama showcasing courage and patriotism.

programme.title: Kanjoos Makkichoos
programme.desc: Jamuna Prasad Pandey, known for his frugality, saves diligently to send his parents on a pilgrimage. However, when they go missing during a flood, he battles bureaucratic corruption to claim compensation, leading to a series of comedic and emotional events.

programme.title: Gadar 2
programme.desc: Directed by Anil Sharma, Gadar 2 continues the saga of Tara Singh (Sunny Deol) and Sakeena (Ameesha Patel). Set against the backdrop of the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971, the film follows Tara's daring mission to save his imprisoned son, Jeete, blending intense action with emotional depth.

programme.desc: Jamuna Prasad Pandey, known for his frugality, saves diligently to send his parents on a pilgrimage. However, when they go missing during a flood, he battles bureaucratic corruption to claim compensation, leading to a series of comedic and emotional events.

Set against the backdrop of the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971, the film follows Tara's daring mission to save his imprisoned son, Jeete, blending intense action with emotional depth.

programme.title: URI - The Surgical Strike
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, URI – The Surgical Strike chronicles the Indian Army’s 2016 surgical strike on terror launchpads across the Line of Control in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir. Led by Major Vihaan Singh Shergill, the mission is carried out as retaliation for the deadly Uri base camp attack. With intense training, strategic execution, and nationalistic fervor, the film is a gripping military action drama showcasing courage and patriotism.

programme.title: Kanjoos Makkichoos
programme.desc: Jamuna Prasad Pandey, known for his frugality, saves diligently to send his parents on a pilgrimage. However, when they go missing during a flood, he battles bureaucratic corruption to claim compensation, leading to a series of comedic and emotional events.

programme.title: Kedarnath
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the 2013 floods in Uttarakhand, Kedarnath is an interfaith love story between Mandakini, a wealthy Hindu pilgrim, and Mansoor, a humble Muslim porter who carries her during her journey to the Kedarnath temple. Their growing romance faces opposition from society and family, ultimately tested by nature’s fury. The film blends spiritual, romantic, and disaster elements with emotional depth.

programme.title: Love Hostel
programme.desc: Love Hostel is a gritty romantic thriller that explores the dark realities of honor killings in India. The story follows Ashu and Jyoti, a couple from different religious backgrounds who elope to escape the wrath of their families. As they seek a new beginning, they are relentlessly hunted by a ruthless mercenary hired to restore "family honor." Starring Vikrant Massey, Sanya Malhotra, and Bobby Deol, the film is a raw and intense portrayal of love caught in the crossfire of social prejudice and violence. Directed by Shanker Raman, the movie is a chilling commentary on intolerance and the price of defiance.
